text: Govindankutty Thirakkilanu is a 2004 Indian Malayalam film, written and directed by Vinod Narayanan, script by Jayachandran Chigoly, cinematography by Kiran G. Nath, starring Jagathy Sreekumar,K.P.A.C. Lalitha, Indrans, and Kottayam Nazeer in the lead role.http://spicyonion.com/title/govindankutty- thirakkilanu-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar * P. V. Jagadish Kumar * Kottayam Nazeer * Indrans * K.P.A.C. Lalitha ==References== ==External links== * Category:2004 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam- language films
title: Govindankutty Thirakkilanu
